persName.roleName: 2nd Earl of Elgin and 1st Earl of Ailesbury

note.p: Birth: Parish of St Bartholomew-the-Less, London, England, Europe (c. March 1626)
Death: Houghton Park, Ampthill, Bedfordshire, England, Europe (20 October 1685)
Burial Place: Maulden, Ampthill, Bedfordshire, England, Europe (26 October 1685)

Career: Travelled in Italy (c. 1645) where he met John Evelyn (FRS 1663); Lord-Lieutenant of Bedfordshire (1660-death), Huntingdonshire (1681-death), Cambridgeshire (1685-death); MP for Bedfordshire (1660-1661); Privy Councillor (1678); Custos Rotulorum for Bedfordshire and Huntingdonshire (1681-death); Recorder of Bedford and Godmanchester (1684-death); Gentleman of the King's Bedchamber; Lord Chamberlain to James II (1685)
Honours: Baron Bruce of Skelton, Viscount Bruce of Ampthill and Earl of Ailesbury 1664
Council: Sworn into Council on 20 December 1669.
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; GEC; Evelyn; Henning

Notes: The election date is Bruce's election date into the Society after the grant of the second charter in April 1663. All Fellows admitted in a two-month window after this charter, until 22 June 1663, are considered Original Fellows.
